text: Adrienne Louise Clarkson (; n√©e Poy, February 10, 1939) is a Hong Kong-born Canadian journalist and politician. She was the 26th Governor General of Canada from 1999 through 2005. ==References== ==Other websites== * * The Governor General of Canada - Former Governors General * Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese politicians Category:Chinese journalists Category:Canadian journalists Category:Canadian television presenters Category:Governors-general of Canada Category:Politicians from Ontario Category:Writers from Ontario Category:Privy Councillors (Canada) Category:University of Toronto alumni
